seniority_level.evidence: Title is "Data Engineer" without senior qualifier and no years of experience specified; typical mid-level role.

job_family.evidence: Job title and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, warehousing, and ETL.

sub_specialty.evidence: Primary technical focus is designing scalable data warehouse solutions on Snowflake.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management or tech‑lead responsibilities; role described as individual contributor.

primary_cloud.evidence: Job description does not reference any specific cloud provider (AWS, Azure, GCP).

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms are mentioned.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Responsibilities include both batch and real‑time processing.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Snowflake is explicitly mentioned as the data warehouse solution.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Hyderabad, India with no remote work language.

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, implying Indian Standard Time (IST).

relocation_required.evidence: No relocation assistance or requirement is mentioned; candidate is expected to be already in Hyderabad.

h1b_friendly.evidence: Visa sponsorship is not mentioned in the posting.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No reference to OPT/CPT or student visa eligibility.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are stated.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type (W2, C2C, 1099) is not specified.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits (health, PTO, equity, etc.) are described.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: The posting does not discuss career progression or growth paths.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship or coaching programs are referenced.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotions or advancement is present.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: The posting does not mention internal transfers or mobility.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A clear list of must‑have hard skills plus a separate nice‑to‑have list indicates balanced strictness.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description is focused specifically on data engineering responsibilities.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set aligns with a typical mid‑level data engineer; no unrealistic senior‑level expectations.
